wars.name: Russia-Ukraine Conflict
wars.description: An ongoing conflict marked by Russia's invasion of Ukraine and significant international support for Ukraine.

sides.name: Ukraine
sides.description: Defending its sovereignty against external aggression.

sides.name: Russia
sides.description: The invading force facing extensive international sanctions.

wars.name: Syrian Civil War
wars.description: A multifaceted conflict involving the Syrian government and a variety of opposition groups.

sides.name: Syrian Government
sides.description: Led by Bashar al-Assad, maintaining power with the help of key allies.

sides.name: Rebel Groups
sides.description: A collection of factions seeking the overthrow of the current government.

wars.name: Yemen Conflict
wars.description: A civil war between the internationally recognized government and Houthi rebels.

sides.name: Hadi Government
sides.description: The internationally recognized authority supported by a Saudi-led coalition.

sides.name: Houthi Rebels
sides.description: A rebel movement that has taken control of significant portions of the country.

wars.name: Libyan Civil Conflict
wars.description: A power struggle between rival factions vying for control in Libya.

sides.name: Government of National Unity (GNU)
sides.description: Recognized by the United Nations and supported by several international actors.

sides.name: Libyan National Army (LNA)
sides.description: Opposition forces led by Khalifa Haftar aiming to consolidate power.
